input.label: Proxy URL - Keep Blank if there is no proxy - If proxy is required, type the URL - Example: myproxyserver.com
Proxy Port - Keep Blank, unless you have filled out Proxy URL - If proxy port is required, type just the port - Example: 8080
Proxy User - If proxy user is required, type the username - Example: userName
Proxy Password - If proxy user is required, you must have a password - Example: myeasytorememberpassword
